input.prompt:
webtoon style. Create a full-body webtoon character portrait based on this person.

Character Name: Hao

Style Requirements:
- Clean webtoon art style with vibrant colors and clear linework
- Full body shot in neutral standing pose
- Simple solid color background
- Transform the person into webtoon illustration style with slightly simplified features
- Maintain their distinctive facial features, hair style, and proportions
- Design a stylish, memorable outfit appropriate for a webtoon protagonist
- Add visual appeal while keeping the essence of the original person

The character should look like an appealing webtoon protagonist version of this person.
